page.title: 13CARE OF THE ELDERLY
page.content: There are some{council bungalows}for old people, some connected by bell to a warden controlled unit. These residents can summon help by using their bells. The{meals on wheels}service delivers hot meals from Frampton House kitchen unit to elderly people in the area who have been recommended by their doctors as likely to benefit from such help. At Christmas time all receive a traditional dinner of turkey and plum pudding. Meals are delivered by voluntary car drivers. The housebound elderly are provided with a{library service}when volunteers take a selection of books from the local library for people to make their own choice.
